  name: "my_autoscaling_policy",
  policy: {
    roles: ["data_hot"],
    deciders: {
      fixed: {
        storage: "1tb",
        memory: "32gb",
        processors: 2.3,
        nodes: 8,
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
